name: Frantic Farmer (A44'sArcade)
description:
This is a short little platformer I made with a friend where you play as a farmer trying to collect as many grapes as they can before the time runs out. This is my first "full" project I made with the monogame framework, so it's pretty janky in a lot of ways (especially with collisions), but I think that suits a game about grapes.

Controls:
WASD to move around
Space to jump
C to collect grapes

All sprites are made by Potat. Please support him at https://twitter.com/ArtPotats
